DataElement.preferredName: Participant Personal Medical History Congestive Heart Failure Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no/unknown response related to the participant's medical history of congestive heart failure.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Personal Medical History Congestive Heart Failure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Participant medical history -congestive heart failure: failure of the heart to pump a sufficient amount of blood to meet the needs of the body tissues, resulting in tissue congestion and edema. Signs and symptoms include shortness of breath, pitting edema, enlarged tender liver, engorged neck veins, and pulmonary rales.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: A complication of HEART DISEASES. Defective cardiac filling and/or impaired contraction and emptying, resulting in the heart's inability to pump a sufficient amount of blood to meet the needs of the body tissues or to be able to do so only with an elevated filling pressure. (from Braunwald, Heart Disease, 5th ed)

Concepts.definition: Failure of the heart to pump a sufficient amount of blood to meet the needs of the body tissues, resulting in tissue congestion and edema. Signs and symptoms include shortness of breath, pitting edema, enlarged tender liver, engorged neck veins, and pulmonary rales.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NINDS:National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke Common Data Element Project
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 5/25/18 - smt CDE transferred to NCIP ownership per NINDS (Muniza Sheikh) request.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.
